statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting FROM user_preferences WHERE temperature_setting > 20.5;
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT id, user_id, temperature_setting FROM user_preferences;
SELECT id, user_id, temperature_setting FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting FROM user_preferences WHERE temperature_setting > 25 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 3 OR user_id = 5 ORDER BY temperature_setting DESC
SELECT id, user_id, temperature_setting FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id IN (1, 4, 6) AND temperature_setting BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT user_id, AVG(temperature_setting) AS avg_temperature FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_temperature > 25 ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_preferences WHERE temperature_setting < 20 ORDER BY user_id
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, timestamp, previous_temperature, new_temperature FROM TemperatureHistory ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, previous_temperature FROM TemperatureHistory WHERE new_temperature > 25;
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, previous_temperature, new_temperature FROM TemperatureHistory WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting FROM UserPreferences WHERE temperature_setting > 20;
SELECT user_id, previous_temperature, new_temperature FROM TemperatureHistory WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT user_id, temperature_setting FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM TemperatureSettings;
SELECT user_id, preferred_temperature FROM TemperatureSettings WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, time_zone, preferred_temperature FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM UserDevices WHERE device_type = 'Thermostat';
SELECT user_id, preferred_temperature, preferred_location FROM UserPreferences WHERE time_zone = 'UTC' ORDER BY preferred_temperature ASC;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureSettings WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, time_zone, preferred_temperature FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_temperature > 25 ORDER BY time_zone DESC
SELECT user_id, preferred_temperature, preferred_location FROM UserPreferences WHERE preferred_location LIKE '%beach%'
SELECT user_id, device_name FROM UserDevices WHERE device_type = 'thermostat' ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT user_id, preferred_temperature FROM TemperatureSettings JOIN UserPreferences ON TemperatureSettings.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id WHERE TemperatureSettings.preferred_temperature > 20
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, temperature_celsius FROM user_preferences WHERE humidity_level > 50;
SELECT device_id, user_id, device_name FROM user_devices ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT user_id, message, notification_time FROM user_notifications WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY notification_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, temperature_celsius FROM user_preferences WHERE temperature_celsius > 25 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, message FROM user_notifications WHERE notification_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY notification_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, device_name, device_type FROM user_devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, humidity_level FROM user_preferences WHERE humidity_level < 50 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences
SELECT user_id, preferred_location FROM user_preferences WHERE is_smart_mode = TRUE
SELECT ac_id, power_mode, temperature_unit FROM ac_settings ORDER BY ac_id DESC
SELECT user_id, event_time, event_description FROM user_history LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, temperature_value FROM temperature_settings
SELECT * FROM temperature_settings;
SELECT user_id, temperature_value FROM temperature_settings WHERE temperature_value > 20;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE is_smart_mode = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, preferred_location FROM user_preferences WHERE preferred_location LIKE '%home%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.user_id, u.preferred_location, a.power_mode FROM user_preferences u JOIN user_ac_rel r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN ac_settings a ON r.ac_id = a.ac_id;
